source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    COALESCE(c.FirstName, '') || ',' || 
    COALESCE(c.MiddleName, '') || ',' || 
    COALESCE(c.LastName, '') AS Name,

    COALESCE(a.AddressLine1, '') || ',' || 
    COALESCE(a.AddressLine2, '') || ',' || 
    COALESCE(a.City, '') || ',' || 
    COALESCE(a.StateProvince, '') || ',' || 
    COALESCE(a.CountryRegion, '') || ',' || 
    COALESCE(a.PostalCode, '') AS Complete_Address
FROM SalesLT.Customer c
JOIN SalesLT.CustomerAddress ca 
    ON c.CustomerID = ca.CustomerID
JOIN SalesLT.Address a 
    ON ca.AddressID = a.AddressID;
